data.name: Microsoft 365 Developer BootCamp Bulgaria 2020
data.description: We are excited to kick off the Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp in Sofia, Bulgaria. This year’s bootcamps will incorporate the technologies and products that are now included in the Microsoft 365 platform. They are held worldwide from October 1 through December 15, 201…
